name: Intrepid Spearman
effect: Level 1+If combat damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.
effect_raw: [Level 1+] If combat damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'The first time combat damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman each turn, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. ->' 'If combat damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.'

flavor: A master lancer, trained to deflect even projectiles.
